original: Berglund, Karl Hjalmar, tandläkare, Kalmar, f. 24/7/93’ i Fodkärna, Kop-parb. 1., av kvarnäg. August B. o. Sofia Mattson. G. 18 m. Stina Sandberg. Barn: Ingegerd f. 19, farm. kand., Målilia, Carl-Gunnar 23, Ingemar o. Carl-Arne 27. — Stud:ex. i Upps. 14, stud. v. HHS 14-15, tandl:kand. 16, tandläkare 18. Praktik i Sala 19-25, i Upps. 26-28, i Köping 28-31 o. i Kalmar sed. 31. Skoltandl. v. Köpings stads foiksk. 28-31.
translated: Berglund, Karl Hjalmar, dentist, Kalmar, born on July 24, 1893 in Fodkärna, Kopparberg county. He is the first son of mill owner August B. and Sofia Mattson. He married Stina Sandberg in 1918 and they have four children: Ingegerd, born in 1919, a pharmacy student; Målilia, born in 1921; Carl-Gunnar, born in 1923; and Ingemar and Carl-Arne, born in 1927. Karl Hjalmar completed his secondary education in Uppsala in 1914, studied at HHS from 1914-1915, graduated with a degree in dentistry in 1916 and became a licensed dentist in 1918. He worked as a dentist in Sala from 1919-1925, in Uppsala from 1926-1928, in Köping from 1928-1931 and in Kalmar since 1931. He also served as a school dentist at Köping's municipal public school from 1928-1931.
